LJCInit.summary: Initializes the object values after the object has been created.
LJCInit.remarks: This allows the object to be initialized after the constructor.

LJCLoad.summary: Loads the object data after it has been initialized with LJCInit().
LJCLoad.remarks: This allows the object to be loaded after any load events.

LJCSetSelectedItem.summary: Sets the selected item based on the supplied ID value.

LJCGetSelectedItem.returns: A reference to the item object.

LJCGetSelectedItemID.summary: Retrieves the selected item ID value.
